      • dualProcFrames

        public int dualProcFrames(byte[] vlInData,
                          byte[] vlOutData,
                          byte[] irInData,
                          byte[] irOutData,
                          byte[] resultData)
        Parameters:
        irInData - 红外数据原始数据，每个像素一个U8，大小为192*256
        irOutData - 红外数据，格式与安卓中的bitmap-ARGB兼容，宽高分别是192*256
        vlInData - 可见光数据原始数据，每个像素三个U8，分别为RGB，总大小为3*640*480
        vlOutData - 可见光数据，格式与安卓中的bitmap-ARGB兼容，宽高分别是640*480
        resultData - length 24, 当配准成功后, 返回配准数据，保存到需要保存的地方，如nv分区(return data when libusbdual calibration success)

        Returns:
        state {CAMERAS_YET_FIXED(1) the cameras are not fixed yet, {IMAGES_YET_STEADY(2) the images after filters are not steady yet, {WAITING_FOR_IMAGES(3) steady images with patterns can be sent in, {RECOGNIZING(4) images are being processed to recognize patterns, {ANALYZING_RECOG_FAIL(5) the fail of recognization is being analyzed, {COMPUTING(6) the points of pattern are being processed to compute calibration parameters, {DONE_SUCCESS(7) calibration of the cameras is successful, {DONE_FAIL(8) calibration of the cameras is unsuccessful

      • dualCalibrationStart

        public int dualCalibrationStart(int pattern_width,
                                int pattern_height,
                                double pattern_space,
                                int calib_cnt,
                                boolean vl_distorted,
                                double cam_dist,
                                boolean is_horizontal,
                                double ratio_thresh,
                                double rot_thresh)
        start usb dual calibration
        Parameters:
        pattern_width - 标靶阵列横向目标个数【Number of horizontal targets of target array】
        pattern_height - 标靶阵列纵向目标个数【Number of longitudinal targets of target array】
        pattern_space - 标靶阵列目标间距，单位：m【Target spacing of target array, unit: m】
        calib_cnt - 标定不同位置的个数【dual calibration recognize success times, The minimum number of times shall not be less than 13】
        vl_distorted - 可见光图像是否存在畸变
        cam_dist - 两个模组的设计间距，单位：m
        is_horizontal - 如果是true，模组沿画面的水平方向摆放 （特别注意画面的水平方向不一定是结构的水平方向）；否则沿画面竖直方向摆放
        ratio_thresh - 计算结果判定阈值，值越小，成功的标准越松，取值范围0-1【The smaller the value is, the looser the success criterion is. range is 0-1】
        rot_thresh - 重映射后，两个相机较大偏转角的阈值，单位：deg
        Returns:

      • dualCalibrationReset

        public int dualCalibrationReset(boolean isDebug)
        Reset all data in usb dual calibration Get the buffer of images to save on disk in debug mode
        Parameters:
        isDebug - ture or false
